title: Scientific Research | Mabuwaya Foundation
heroText: Cutting-edge studies to conserve the Philippine crocodile and protect biodiversity for future generations.
sectionIntro: We combine science, ecology, and community partnerships to create sustainable conservation strategies.

cards.title: Habitat Monitoring
cards.text: Long-term monitoring of wetlands, rivers, and forests ensures the survival of the crocodile and the health of ecosystems.

cards.title: Ecological Studies
cards.text: We study breeding behavior, diet, and water quality to maintain balance in fragile habitats.

cards.title: Community Research
cards.text: Local knowledge and traditions are recorded to guide sustainable, community-driven conservation.

cards.title: Conservation Science
cards.text: Scientific experiments and applied studies inform long-term strategies for species protection.

cards.title: Climate Impact Studies
cards.text: Exploring how climate change affects crocodile habitats to prepare adaptive conservation measures.

cards.title: Biodiversity Research
cards.text: Examining links between crocodiles and other species to maintain healthy and diverse ecosystems.
